name: PolyMorph
description:
Shapeshift your way to safety! You need to use your gift to make your way past the various CCTV cameras and patrolling guards to get the truck.

You can change your form into any object that is coloured green. Stand next to it, press space or A on a Xbox 360 controller and *poof*! But your new form won't last long so act quick!

Make sure you hack terminals along the way to save your progress just in case you get caught!

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - move
Space - Use Terminal/Shapeshift

Xbox 360 Controls:

Left Stick - move
A Button - Use Terminal/Shapeshift

Created for Ludum Dare #35
